# nxos_feature_ssh (Data Source)

This data source can read the SSH feature configuration.

- API Documentation: [fmSsh](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/dme-docs-10-3-1/docs/Feature%20Management/fm:Ssh/)

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "nxos_feature_ssh" "example" {
}
```
